DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the pharynx in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty for treatment of obstructive sleep apnea through MRI, before and 6 months after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of The Pharynx in Patients Undergoing Lateral Pharyngoplasty
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of obstructive sleep apnea syndrome MRI contraindications
